thread.title: 6 pieces in Jeff Goldblum's luxury watch collection - from the Rolex Milgauss custom made for his Jurassic Park character, to the vintage Casio he sports as Zeus in Netflix's Kaos | South China Morning Post

author: Carla Thomas
title: 6 pieces in Jeff Goldblum's luxury watch collection - from the Rolex Milgauss custom made for his Jurassic Park character, to the vintage Casio he sports as Zeus in Netflix's Kaos | South China Morning Post
text:
Advertisement Advertisement Advertisement Watches 6 pieces in Jeff Goldblum’s luxury watch collection – from the Rolex Milgauss custom made for his Jurassic Park character, to the vintage Casio he sports as Zeus in Netflix’s Kaos STORY Carla Thomas Dec 27 , 2024
Six pieces in Jeff Goldblum’s watch collection – from his Jurassic Park character’s custom Rolex Milgauss, to his vintage Casio as Zeus, and choosing Cartier’s unconventional Baignoire for the premiere of Wicked. Photo: EPA-EFE Timepieces
